00012         /** \class  EulerAngles
00013         *  Class for storing a 3 dimentional rotation using Euler angles for parameterization
00014         */
00015         public ref class EulerAngles {
00016 
00017         public:
00018                 /**
00019                 * @brief Contrustor setting all angles to zero.
00020                 */
00021                 EulerAngles() : alpha(0.0),beta(0.0),gamma(0.0) { }
00022 
00023                 /**
00024                 * @brief Contrustor setting all angles.
00025                 * @param _alpha Value of alpha angle.
00026                 * @param _beta Value of beta angle.
00027                 * @param _gamma Value of gamma angle.
00028                 */
00029                 EulerAngles(double _alpha,double _beta, double _gamma): alpha(_alpha),beta(_beta),gamma(_gamma) {}
00030 
00031                 /**
00032                 * @brief Setter for all angles
00033                 * @param _alpha Value of alpha angle.
00034                 * @param _beta Value of beta angle.
00035                 * @param _gamma Value of gamma angle.
00036                 */
00037                 void Set(double _alpha,double _beta, double _gamma) {alpha=_alpha;  beta= _beta; gamma=_gamma; }
00038                 void Normalize() {};
00039 
00040                 /**
00041                 * @brief Getter of normalized eulerangles object.
00042                 * @result Returns normalized eulerangles object.
00043                 */
00044                 EulerAngles^ Normalized() { return this;}
00045 
00046                 /**
00047                 * @brief Operator for checking if two object are equal
00048                 */
00049                 bool operator==(EulerAngles o)  { return alpha == o.alpha &&  beta == o.beta && gamma == o.gamma;}
00050 
00051                 /**
00052                 * @brief Operator for checking if two object are not equal
00053                 */
00054                 bool operator!=(EulerAngles o) { return alpha != o.alpha ||  beta != o.beta || gamma != o.gamma;}
00055 
00056                 double alpha,beta,gamma; ///< Alpha beta gamma angles
00057         };
